    zwsroutinetools

    The zwsroutinetools package provides utility tools helpful to work in a GE-routine.

    Installation

    The package can only be installed from github

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github('pvrqualitasag/zwsroutinetools')
#> Skipping install of 'zwsroutinetools' from a github remote, the SHA1 (f199ac95) has not changed since last install.
#>   Use `force = TRUE` to force installation

    Examples that show the usefulness of these tools will follow soon …
